item.title: 美国经济也在断裂
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 花旗集团称，低于 60 美元的石油价格将削弱美国页岩油产量
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统推动增加国内石油产量和降低能源价格之际，花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Amid President Donald Trump’s push for more domestic oil output and lower energy prices, Citigroup Inc. is warning that the prospect of weakening returns threatens to stifle drilling.】

item.title: 挪威贸易大臣迈尔塞斯努力争取欧盟关税豁免
item.description: 挪威贸易大臣塞西莉-米尔塞特（Cecilie Myrseth）会见了欧盟官员，北欧国家正在寻求豁免欧盟为应对美国发起的贸易战而可能征收的广泛保护性关税。【原文：Norway’s Trade Minister Cecilie Myrseth met with European Union officials as the Nordic country seeks an exemption to any broad protective tariff the bloc could levy as a response to a US initiated trade war.】

item.title: 假收费短信现在以司机居住地为目标
item.description:
不断涌现的骗局威胁驾驶者将因未支付通行费而受到处罚和法律制裁。【原文：

Surging scam threatens motorists with penalties and legal action for unpaid tolls.

】

item.title: 利润率骤降，Glencore 全面整顿陷入困境的加拿大冶炼厂
item.description: 继去年裁员后，Glencore Plc 将加倍努力削减加拿大铜锌厂的成本，这是继加工利润崩溃后对其全球冶炼业务的进一步整顿。【原文：Glencore Plc is doubling down on a cost-cutting drive at its Canadian copper and zinc plants following job cuts last year, in a further overhaul of its global smelting business following a collapse in processing margins.】

item.title: 经济担忧重创与美国人消费密切相关的股票
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统善变的贸易政策正在引发人们对美国经济稳定性的担忧，而最依赖美国消费者力量的股票也开始感受到压力。【原文：President Donald Trump’s fickle trade policies are raising concerns about US economic stability, and the stocks most reliant on the strength of the American consumer are starting to feel the pinch.】

item.title: Z 世代美国人的存款不足以支付一个月的开支
item.description: 美国年轻人的存款不足以支付一个月的开支，这表明一旦经济陷入衰退，他们就很容易受到影响。【原文：Younger Americans don’t have enough saved to cover a single month of spending, showcasing their vulnerability should the economy head into a downturn.】

item.title: 卡尼宣誓就任加拿大领导人，贸易将成为主要议程
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）宣誓就任加拿大第 24 任总理，这位前央行行长在与美国的爆炸性贸易战中上台执政。【原文：Mark Carney has been sworn in as Canada’s 24th prime minister, bringing the former central banker to power in the middle of an explosive trade war with the US.】

item.title: 荷兰银行因薪酬限制问题与荷兰中央银行交恶
item.description: 荷兰银行（ABN Amro Bank NV）表示，由于与荷兰中央银行在涉嫌违反薪酬限制的问题上存在意见分歧，该公司可能面临被罚款的风险。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV said it could be at the risk of financial penalties as a result of a difference of opinion with the Dutch central bank over alleged violations of its pay restrictions.】

item.title: 南非财政部长否认在提高增值税问题上肆意妄为
item.description: 南非财政部长否认他无视国家财政部关于不将增值税提高两个百分点的建议，此举导致上个月的预算被推迟。【原文：South Africa’s finance minister denied that he ignored advice from the National Treasury not to raise value-added tax by two percentage points, the move that led to last month’s budget being postponed.】

item.title: Crayon 和 SoftwareOne 交易面临小股东的威胁
item.description: SoftwareOne Holding AG 公司以 129 亿克朗（11.4 亿美元）的价格收购挪威 Crayon Group Holding 公司的交易，可能会受到以十大股东为首的一批投资者的质疑。【原文：SoftwareOne Holding AG’s 12.9 billion-krone ($1.14 billion) takeover bid for Norwegian firm Crayon Group Holding may be challenged by a group of investors led by a top-10 shareholder.】

item.title: 华盛顿特区为国会 "毁灭性 "的削减做准备
item.description:
特区都会区的地方领导人对国会的一项权宜之计提出警告，该措施将导致特区出现 10 亿美元的预算缺口。【原文：

Local leaders across the DC metro area are raising alarms about a stopgap measure in Congress that would trigger a $1 billion budget shortfall for the city.

】

item.title: 英伟达展望 DeepSeek 和关税之后的人工智能新篇章
item.description:
没有人比英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋更能从人工智能的繁荣中获益。面对未来令人担忧的迹象，他正试图延长这段美好时光。【原文：

No one has benefited more from the AI boom than Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang. With troubling signs ahead, he’s trying to extend the good times.

】

item.title: 雅培、利洁时因法官批准重新审理婴儿配方奶粉案而倒下
item.description: 雅培实验室和利洁时集团股价下跌，原因是法官驳回了这两家公司因隐瞒早产儿配方奶粉潜在风险而被免除责任的判决，并下令重新审理。【原文：Abbott Laboratories and Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc shares fell as a judge ordered a new trial after rejecting a verdict that had cleared the companies of liability over claims they hid potential risks of their premature-infant formulas.】

item.title: 乐购供应商 Bakkavor 拒绝了 Greencore 11.4 亿英镑的收购要约
item.description: Bakkavor Group Plc 拒绝了爱尔兰方便食品制造商 Greencore Group Plc 提出的现金加股票的出价，该出价对这家在伦敦上市的公司的估值为 11.4 亿英镑（15 亿美元）。【原文：Bakkavor Group Plc rejected a cash and stock bid from Irish convenience food manufacturer Greencore Group Plc valuing the London-listed firm at £1.14 billion ($1.5 billion).】

item.title: 美国向北约施压，国防 ETF 吸金 14 亿美元
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推动欧洲国家增加军费开支，专注于国防和军火公司的交易所交易基金正在快速流入。【原文：Exchange-traded funds focused on defense and arms companies are amassing inflows at a brisk clip as US President Donald Trump pushes for European countries to increase their military spending.】

item.title: 七国集团取消 "两国解决方案 "以推动公报通过
item.description: 七国集团外长已就一项联合声明达成共识，呼吁如果俄罗斯不同意停火，就对其实施更多制裁。但熟悉内情的人士说，只有在盟国向美国做出让步，包括不再提及以色列和巴勒斯坦冲突中的 "两国解决方案 "后，才有可能取得突破。【原文：Group of Seven foreign ministers have reached consensus on a joint statement calling for more sanctions on Russia if it doesn’t agree to a ceasefire. But the breakthrough was possible only after allies made concessions to the US, including removing any mention of a “two-state solution” in the conflict between Israelis and Palestinians, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴克莱警告：政策担忧如雪球般越滚越大，信用风险正在上升
item.description: 本周，美国信贷市场受到经济动荡的冲击，收益率不断走高，企业借款人纷纷推迟销售，巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）因此变得更加谨慎，称市场忽视了经济衰退的可能性正在增加。【原文：After economic jitters shook the US credit market this week, widening yields and driving corporate borrowers to postpone sales, Barclays Plc is turning more cautious saying the market is overlooking the growing odds of a recession.】

item.title: 欧盟和厄瓜多尔警方在缴获 80 吨毒品后破获可卡因团伙
item.description: 欧洲和拉丁美洲警方称，经过一年的调查，他们破获了一个国际可卡因贩运团伙，缴获了超过 73 公吨（80 美元吨）的毒品。【原文：Police in Europe and Latin America said they busted an international cocaine trafficking ring after a year-long probe that led to the seizure of more than 73 metric tons (80 US tons) of the drug.】

item.title: 卡尼在贸易战战略中任命香槟为财政部长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，当马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周五接任总理一职时，弗朗索瓦-菲利普-香槟（Francois-Phillipe Champagne）将被任命为加拿大新任财政部长。【原文：Francois-Phillipe Champagne will be named as Canada’s new finance minister when Mark Carney takes over as prime minister on Friday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百事公司接近以 15 亿美元以上的价格收购苏打水品牌 Poppi
item.description: 据知情人士透露，百事公司（PepsiCo Inc.【原文：PepsiCo Inc. is in advanced talks to buy healthier soda brand Poppi, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 阿斯达预测利润受挫，杂货商投资赢回购物者
item.description: 英国第三大连锁超市阿斯达（Asda）董事长艾伦-莱顿（Allan Leighton）正在对该公司进行全面改革，以赢回顾客。【原文：Asda is warning of lower profitability this year as Chairman Allan Leighton overhauls Britain’s third-biggest supermarket chain to win back customers.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数下降，价格预期因关税而飙升
item.description: 美国消费者情绪跌至两年多来的最低点，长期通胀预期跃升至 1993 年以来的最高点，这表明人们对关税带来的经济影响越来越担忧。【原文：US consumer sentiment fell to a more than two-year low and long-term inflation expectations jumped by the most since 1993, illustrating growing apprehension about the economic impact from tariffs.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦认为基线方案面临 "非常重大 "的风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）表示，欧洲中央银行对通货膨胀和经济增长的假设在每个方向上都面临着巨大的风险，他说，这种不可预测性使得我们无法预测进一步的利率变动。【原文：The European Central Bank’s assumptions for inflation and economic growth face big risks in each direction, according to Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva, who said such unpredictability makes it impossible to predict further interest-rate moves.】

item.title: 德国机构警告不要终止化石燃料供暖禁令
item.description: 德国环境署警告即将上任的政府不要放弃禁止使用化石燃料供暖系统，因为德国将在住房和交通领域以微弱劣势无法实现 2030 年的气候目标。【原文：Germany’s Environment Agency warned the incoming government against tossing out a ban on fossil-fuel heating systems, with the nation poised to narrowly miss its 2030 climate targets in the housing and transport sectors.】

item.title: 核电热潮意味着德国也在吸引新投资
item.description: 尽管德国关闭了所有反应堆，但仍是国际燃料循环的重要环节。【原文：Resurgent interest in atomic power means the world’s second-biggest provider of enriched uranium is expanding even in Germany, which remains an essential link in the international fuel cycle despite turning off all its reactors.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚极右翼党领导人西米昂提交总统竞选申请
item.description: 罗马尼亚最大的极右翼政党领导人提交了参加 5 月总统选举的申请，希望以此拉拢因极端主义立场而被禁止参选的前领跑者卡林-乔治斯库的支持者。【原文：The leader of Romania’s largest far-right party submitted his bid to run in May’s presidential elections, hoping to rally supporters of the previous frontrunner Calin Georgescu, who was barred from the race over his extremist stances.】

item.title: DWS 将明星员工凯利调离管理岗位，由首席执行官接任
item.description: DWS 集团另类投资主管保罗-凯利（Paul Kelly）在负责德意志银行投资部门的这一重要部门仅两年后，即将卸任。【原文：DWS Group alternatives head Paul Kelly is stepping aside from his role after just two years in charge of the key division at Deutsche Bank AG’s investment arm.】

item.title: 美国股市从关税引发的调整中面临不均衡复苏
item.description: 仅用了 16 个交易日，美国股市就陷入了调整，这让焦头烂额的华尔街不禁要问，白宫官员警告的 "调整期 "到底会持续多久。【原文：It took just 16 trading sessions for US stocks to tumble into a correction, leaving a frazzled Wall Street asking just how long the “adjustment period” White House officials have warned about will last.】

item.title: 中国宏桥董事长坚信国内支持将抵消贸易风险
item.description: 中国宏桥集团有限公司相信，国内政策将促进铝需求，使中国最大的私营铝金属生产商免受贸易壁垒等地缘政治因素的影响。【原文：China Hongqiao Group Ltd. is confident domestic policies will boost aluminum demand, shielding the nation’s biggest private producer of the metal from geopolitical headwinds such as trade barriers.】
